items.sentence: Tom just stood there with a smile on his face.
I'm not the one responsible for what happened.
I just hope that we make it out of here alive.
Recently, I've been eating three apples a day.
You look a lot like an old girlfriend of mine.
You look like you have something on your mind.
You look like you know how to handle yourself.
Ask me any question and I'll try to answer it.
We need to finish this project before October.
Please show me how to use the washing machine.
